Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, his civilian identity Duke, and his initial investigation into suspicious activities at the waterfront, leading to his infiltration of a yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Service
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, encounters wealthy men who request a ride to the restricted waterfront, setting the stage for his superhero involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Duke notices G-Man Holden's car and transforms into the Human Meteor, deciding to investigate the suspicious events at the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor deals with 'cop shooters' and then visits G-Man Holden in the hospital, receiving a new mission related to a suspicious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with Toby to infiltrate the yacht to investigate the suspected submarine meeting.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Crew and Toby's Peril
sub_scenes.description: Duke investigates the yacht while Toby is discovered and thrown overboard, leading to Duke's intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Uncovering the Submarine Plot
Major_Arcs.description: Human Meteor delves into the underwater mystery, discovering a sunken Japanese submarine being resupplied and engaging in underwater combat to thwart the enemy's plans.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as Human Meteor, approaches the yacht underwater and discovers the sunken Japanese submarine and the ongoing resupply operation.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Yacht Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor fights with enemy divers and then attacks the submarine and a ship involved in the resupply operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack

sub_scenes.title: Surface, Discovery and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Duke returns to the surface, finds crucial evidence on the yacht, and reports his findings to a naval officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air
Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Bus Garage
Major_Arcs.description: Skip and Chuck, the Liberty Lads, become involved in uncovering a Nazi spy ring operating out of a bus garage after finding a dropped wallet.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and Wallet Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck witness an ambulance and find a dropped wallet, leading them to investigate further.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate

sub_scenes.title: Garage Inquiry and Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: The boys approach the bus garage, encounter a marine saluting a civilian, and then meet the intimidating Mr. Horst after returning the wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire
Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait
Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, while a sinister plan involving carbon monoxide is discussed by others in the garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents
Accusation of Lying in Another Room

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Shooting, and Escape
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, Major Bronson is shot, and the boys escape amidst the chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The boys decide to seek help, and Chuck encounters a marine sergeant who aids them, while Skip discovers sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrive and Resolve Spy Ring
sub_scenes.description: Marines are alerted, arrive at the scene, and engage in a final confrontation, leading to the dismantling of the Nazi spy ring and the aftermath of Major Bronson's injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: Champ and Henry's adventure in South America as they get embroiled in the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre and his Axis connections.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Discovery in South America
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and their arrival in a sleepy South American town where their presence is noted by local authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated by officers who reveal the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping

sub_scenes.title: Forced Abduction and Meeting Rosita's Mother
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are abducted and taken to Rosita's mother, who reveals their role in rescuing her daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and El Tigre Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry plan and execute an infiltration into El Tigre's hideout, using distraction tactics and ultimately confronting and revealing El Tigre himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Inside El Tigre's hideout, interrogations and searches ensue, revealing Rosita's location and leading to her rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping
Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions
Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost
Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility
Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention
Government Troops and Search for Fascists

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: Devil Dog Dolan's jungle mission involving sub detector plans, capture, torture, escape, and confrontation with natives.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat and then reports disobedience to Captain Lawton, revealing the captain's capture and a dangerous bargain.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Pursuit and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is pursued into the jungle, walks into a hidden threat, and is ultimately ambushed and captured by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Torture and Deception
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is subjected to torture to extract information about sub detector plans and is forced to write a note, but he secretly plans to undermine the enemy.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Reactions to Dolan's actions, including a marine's pursuit, enemy dismissal, and Dolan's encounter with natives leading to a shift in allegiance.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Decision and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma, intervention, fight, and the disciplinary aftermath within the service.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder
Major_Arcs.description: Diane and Dan Weston, the Twinkle Twins, investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a racketeering scheme and help a sick child.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their mission, followed by a briefing at the Weston Call newspaper about the Burgess murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The twins inquire at the police station about Tom Reilly and then visit him at the hospital, discovering his sick daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicion and Radio Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The twins suspect racketeering, contact Elijah, and then hear a radio broadcast revealing crucial connections in the case, leading them to pursue Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Gunfire
sub_scenes.description: The twins investigate in the Irish section, meet Mrs. Murphy who explains Reilly's situation, and are suddenly caught in gunfire as they try to help Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

sub_scenes.title: Citizen Blockade and Police Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A car chase ensues, halted by a citizen blockade, leading to a community uprising and police intervention to arrest the criminals.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Police assess the crime scene, twins rush to the shooting scene, and then initiate a community blood donation to help Tom Reilly at the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid
Community Responds to Blood Donation Call

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Happy Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The story concludes with Farnacci's arrest and a celebration of Reilly's daughter's recovery, marking a happy ending to the Twinkle Twins' investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci
Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment
